articles.title: Women's Champions League: Morocco's AS FAR beat Sundowns to grab 1st trophy - Africanews English
articles.description: Rabat's AS FAR won Sunday (Nov 13) the African Women's Champions League for the first time in their history after beating nine-time defending champions Mamelodi Sundowns (4-0). AS FAR Club are the first team to win all their games in a single CAFWCL tournamen…
articles.content:
Rabat's AS FAR won Sunday (Nov 13) the African Women's Champions League for the first time in their history after beating nine-time defending champions Mamelodi Sundowns (4-0).

articles.title: Musk mocks Twitter staff fired for criticising him. 'These geniuses' will 'be of great use elsewhere'. - Business Insider South Africa
articles.description: Musk posted a sarcastic tweet amid reports he'd fired several Twitter staff who'd criticised him on internal Slack chats and on Twitter itself.
articles.content:

articles.description: Nigerian singer-songwriter Tems has been nominated for her writing on Beyonce's Renaissance album and for rapper Drake's Wait For U song which is nominated for Record of the Year.
articles.content:
